post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hello,
I found your resume in our database, we have one urgent role let me know if you are interested also mail me your updated resume:
Role: Sr. J2ee Developer
Duration: 10 Months
Location: 404/Elgin Mills
Java/ J2EE,JSP, Servlet, and EJB,Hibernate
WebSphere version 5 (or 6)
WSAD 5 (or RAD 7) or up experience
JMS, MQ Series, Struts
Source Code Control
Spring
JQuery
Provides direction and takes responsibility for entire development projects including project planning and estimation, requirements gathering, analysis, design, coding, testing, conversion, and implementation. Takes responsibility for the activities of multiple staff members working on a project. May make presentations to middle and upper management
Lead project analysis, design and implementation. Translate business needs into functional requirements. Provide accurate and reliable status to management.
Peeyush Jain Sr. Technical Recruiter
2323 Yonge Street, Suite 400 Toronto Ontario M4P 2C9 Procom Consultants Group Ltd.
Direct: (647) 288-5183 Fax: (416) 483-8102 Toll Free: (800) 461-4878 ext 508 Email: peeyushj@procom.ca www.procom.ca
post.title: Sr. J2ee Developer, Cont', 404/Elgin Mills (10 mths)
